body_text:
I sometimes get this in my console when saving a recipe. The recipe is then not saved and I get the notification bar message to correct my errors.
Content Security Policy: The page’s settings blocked the loading of a resource at https://auth.mozilla.auth0.com/authorize?scope=openid%20email%20profile&client_id=[...]&state=19ee113c68300fad49e234f3f8e6b8e2&nonce=12ab40212f95f801c3841df355cb41e7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fnormandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net%2Fauth%2Flogin&response_type=code (“default-src https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net”).
body_html:
I sometimes get this in my console when saving a recipe. The recipe is then not saved and I get the notification bar message to correct my errors.

Content Security Policy: The page’s settings blocked the loading of a resource at https://auth.mozilla.auth0.com/authorize?scope=openid%20email%20profile&client_id=[...]&state=19ee113c68300fad49e234f3f8e6b8e2&nonce=12ab40212f95f801c3841df355cb41e7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fnormandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net%2Fauth%2Flogin&response_type=code (“default-src https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net”).
title: Content Security Policy error when saving recipes
body:
I sometimes get this in my console when saving a recipe. The recipe is then not saved and I get the notification bar message to correct my errors.

Content Security Policy: The page’s settings blocked the loading of a resource at https://auth.mozilla.auth0.com/authorize?scope=openid%20email%20profile&client_id=[...]&state=19ee113c68300fad49e234f3f8e6b8e2&nonce=12ab40212f95f801c3841df355cb41e7&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fnormandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net%2Fauth%2Flogin&response_type=code (“default-src https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net”).
